Package civitas.celestis.world.lifecycle

Class AsyncWorldManager<W extends World<?,?,?>>

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.world.lifecycle.AsyncWorldManager<W>
Type Parameters:
W - The type of world to manager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ThreadedModule, WorldManager<W>
public class AsyncWorldManager<W extends World<?,?,?>> extends Object implements WorldManager<W>
An asynchronous world manger.
